nodes.text: Escalus was a male Human living with his daughter Mila Escalus on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. A descendant of a man who was entrusted by Sith Lord Aloysius Kallig with his lightsaber for safekeeping, Escalus bet the lightsaber along with everything he had against a known Sabacc cheaper Gyl Rosen, losing it in the process.
Mila Escalus's father is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Nar Shaddaa.
